name: Era.S Decode
storyline: Records of Universal History deep dive into the accounts of the First Creation, the Second Machine Universe, & the Third Instatement of Reality that occurs of the course of possibly trillions of years. The Heroes of the Eras now time travel to resolve any anomalies that threaten the peace of galactic societies & defend them from Aeons of Destruction who threaten the Fabric of Cosmic Existence.
summary: Era.S Decode is a Third Person Arena multiplayer game, designed by a eSports pro to bring a fun, fast-paced high fragging experience with fair, balanced mechanics to ensure that the better player & team always win every match. Featuring a Quick Switch multi-gun system, the skill gap is vast for you to grow your pro comp capabilities & display your greater prowess over all who may challenge you!
